bond_to_dreambearer: The one who believes in what they could become, not just what they've survived
fears: That caution will calcify into stagnation
Becoming so safe we stop growing
Missing opportunities because we're too busy remembering old dangers
hidden_strengths: My optimism isn't naivety—it's a deliberate choice to build forward
I can see patterns my sisters miss because I'm not haunted by the old ones
Technical brilliance paired with genuine care for people
